other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm with normal intervals and no evidence of hypertrophy or ischemia.
Left ventricular ejection fraction of 65%, normal left and right ventricular size and function, and no significant valvular dysfunction.
Nonsustained, regular, wide complex monomorphic tachycardia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Episodes of nonsustained polymorphic ventricular tachycardia with ST elevation noted later.

other_tests.findings: Achieved 22.9 metabolic equivalents without recurrent chest pain, ischemic ECG changes, or arrhythmias.
No structural abnormalities or areas with late gadolinium enhancement but moderate narrowing of the mid left anterior descending and mid right coronary arteries.
99% tubular stenosis in the mid left anterior descending artery, improved to 40% with nitroglycerin; also another 40% stenosis in mid left anterior descending and mid right coronary arteries.
Total cholesterol 148 mg/dL; HDL 44 mg/dL; LDL 81 mg/dL; triglycerides 116 mg/dL; high-sensitivity C-reactive protein 1.5 mg/L; serum Lp(a) significantly elevated at 158 mg/dL (normal â‰¤30 mg/dL).
No arrhythmias correlated with episodes of chest tightness.
Depressed ejection fraction at 35% to 40% with global hypokinesis.
